original_text: And the vale of Siddim was full of slimepits; and the kings of Sodom and Gomorrah fled, and fell there; and they that remained fled to the mountain.
korean_text: 싯딤 골짜기에는 역청 구덩이가 많은지라 소돔 왕과 고모라 왕이 달아날 때에 그들이 거기 빠지고 그 나머지는 산으로 도망하매

sentences.original_text: And the vale of Siddim was full of slimepits
and the kings of Sodom and Gomorrah fled
and they that remained fled to the mountain
